body.p:
Georgetown Ky Sept 21th 1861
Capt Ben F. Bradley
Sir I hereby tender my resignation of the position of 1st Lieutenant in the State Guard & respectfully ask that it may be accepted

Respectfully Yours
G. F Allgaier
1st Lieut Union Greys

To His Excellency
Gov. Magoffin Frankfort Ky
Sir I recommend the acceptance of Lieut. Allgaier's resignation

Ben F. Bradley Capt U. G. S. G.
accepted
B. Magoffin
Comr in Chief
